cbccore.events
Class Event<E>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      cbccore.events.Event<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Event<E>
extends java.util.EventObject

Every event should subclass this. Event types may be dynamic, and you can decide how to deal with this, or they can be static (most common). Look at the example code in the "tests" folder included in the CBCJVM distribution. This class also contains a public "data" variable of type "E" for easy ad-hoc expandablity.

Author:
Braden McDorman, Benjamin Woodruff
See Also:
EventManager, EventType, Serialized Form
